All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutFragment
    Displays an TextView containing credits, copyrights, and license information for the app and the supporting libraries.
    CrapsFragment
    Handles presentation of, and user interaction with, a display of the current tally of wins and losses; the rolls and outcome of most recent round of play; and controls to start, stop, and reset the simulation.
    CrapsRepository
    Encapsulates the Craps simulation engine, and acts as a source of simulation data.
    CrapsViewModel
    Exposes simulation-control methods and manages lifecycle-aware subset of system state (model content), for consumption by one or more UI controllers and views.
    MainActivity
    Handles the creation of, and high-level user interaction with, the main screen of the app.
    Roll
    Encapsulates a singe roll of one or more dice.
    Round
    Encapsulates a single round of the Craps shooter's play.
    Round.State
    Enumerates the high-level states of a round of play in Craps.
    SettingsFragment
    Handles presentation of, and user interaction with, preference settings for simulation execution.
    Snapshot
    Encapsulates a snapshot in some moment of a sequence of Craps rounds.
    SnapshotRollsAdapter
    Adapts a Snapshot for use in a RecyclerView.
